SELECT t.id,t.subject,t.create_time,t.begin_time ,t.end_time, t.content,t.create_user,t.status,t.level,t.finish_time ,GROUP_CONCAT( tu.member_id SEPARATOR "," ) memberIds FROM pms_task t LEFT JOIN pms_task_user tu on tu.task_id = t.id WHERE 1=1
AND tu.member_id = #{loginUser.id} AND t.status != "Finish" AND t.status != "Close"
AND tu.member_id = #{loginUser.id} AND (t.status = "Finish" OR t.status = "Close")
AND t.create_user = #{loginUser.id} AND t.status = "Finish"
AND (t.id = #{search} OR t.subject like "%"#{search}"%")
GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pageOffset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(tmp.id) FROM ( SELECT t.id FROM pms_task t LEFT JOIN pms_task_user tu on tu.task_id = t.id WHERE 1=1
AND tu.member_id = #{loginUser.id} AND t.status != "Finish" AND t.status != "Close"
AND tu.member_id = #{loginUser.id} AND (t.status = "Finish" OR t.status = "Close")
AND t.create_user = #{loginUser.id} AND t.status = "Finish"
AND (t.id = #{search} OR t.subject like "%"#{search}"%")
GROUP BY t.id ) tmp
